Title: AN ACT FIXING THE SALARY OF THE CHIEF STATISTICIAN.
Data:
[ Act No. 31, October 24, 1900 ]
AN ACT FIXING THE SALARY OF THE CHIEF STATISTICIAN.
By authority of the President of the United States, be it enacted by the United States Philippine Commission, that:
Section 1. The animal salary of the chief statistician shall be three thousand five hundred dollars in money of the United States.
Section 2. This Act shall relate to the first day of October, nineteen hundred.1a—àphi1
Section 3. This Act shall take effect on its passage.
Enacted, October 24, 1900.
